hadith.text: Narrated Ali ibn AbuTalib: When the morning came, the Prophet (ï·º) stood at the mountain Quzah and said: This is Quzah, and this is a place of stationing, and the whole of al-Muzdalifah is a place of stationing. I sacrificed the animals here, and the whole of Mina is a place of sacrifice. So sacrifice in your dwellings
